name: English_Vocab_Cloze
template_text:
To train my autistic child for English vocab exercise. please generate ten cloze deletion cards of @notetype:cuma-interactive-cloze for the word family of the specified english word.  along with Chinese, The Chinese sentences doesn't need cloze deletion. only English sentences need cloze deletion. please use simplified Chinese characters which is o train my autistic child for English vocab exercise. Generate 10 cloze deletion cards using CUMA - Interactive Cloze note type for the word family of the specified English word.

Format Requirements:
- card_type: 'interactive_cloze'
- note_type: 'CUMA - Interactive Cloze'
- text_field: English sentence with [[c1::word]] cloze, followed by Chinese translation (NO cloze in Chinese)
- Use simplified Chinese characters (mainland China)
- NO Chinese text in images - text rendering quality is poor

Example Format:
Text:
George said, "I [[c1::hate]] waiting in long lines."

George 说："我 讨厌 排长队。"
Extra:
leave it empty for the moment.

Requirements:
- Vivid and easy to visualize
- Age-appropriate for autistic child
- Use characters from the provided character list when available
- 10 cards per word family

Return as JSON array with fields: card_type, note_type, text_field, extra_field (optional), tags
